summary: Fultah Fisher runs a boarding house catering to seamen passing through the port. A girl known as Anne of Austria has had many lovers amongst the sailors, but presently she's known to be the... See full summary Â»
cast: Mildred Owens|Olaf Skavlan|Ethan Allen|Gerald Griffin|Oreste Seragnoli
title: The Ballad of Fisher's Boarding House
